Uses of Class
carpooling_package.Passenger

    • Uses of Passenger in carpooling_package

      Subclasses of Passenger in carpooling_package 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  nonSubscribers
      A class representing nonSubscribers passengers Data only to apply Single Responsibility Principle.
      class  Subscribers
      A class representing Subscribers passengers Data only to apply Single Responsibility Principle.
      Methods in carpooling_package that return Passenger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Passenger Input.addGuest()
      Inputs the name of the guest passenger and creates an object of the guest passenger.
      Passenger Input.addGuest(Passenger p)
      An object of the guest passenger is created.
      Passenger Input.freqPassenger()
      Inputs the name, age and number of trips to be reserved of the frequent passenger and creates an object of the frequent passenger if age and number of trips are suitable while makes the passenger continue in the system as a guest if not.
      Passenger Input.freqPassenger(Passenger p)
      Inputs the age and number of trips to be reserved of the frequent passenger and creates an object of the frequent passenger if age and number of trips are suitable while makes the passenger continue in the system as a guest if not.
      Passenger guest.subscribeFreq(Passenger p)
      Allows Guest passengers to subscribe and become Subscribers passengers.
      Passenger guestImpl.subscribeFreq(Passenger p)
      Allows non-Subscribers passengers to subscribe and become Subscribers.
      Passenger freqPassenger.unsubscribe(Passenger p)
      Allows Subscribers passengers to un-subscribe and become guest passengers.
      Passenger freqPassengerImpl.unsubscribe(Passenger p)
      Allows Subscribers passengers to un-subscribe and become guest passengers.
